General.Name: Renewables Infrastructure Grp
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: The Renewables Infrastructure Group Limited specializes in infrastructure investments. The fund typically invests in operational assets which generate electricity from renewable sources, with a particular focus on onshore wind farms and solar photovoltaic parks. It seeks to invest in United Kingdom and Northern European countries including France, Ireland, Germany and Scandinavia. The fund seeks to invest through equity and shareholder loans.
General.Address: East Wing, Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, GY1 3PP
